basics.name: Francisco José García
basics.label: Full Stack developer & Lawyer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with experience in frontend and backend, specialized in modern technologies and agile methodologies. Lawyer with training in criminal law. Experience in web and mobile application development, API integration, performance optimization and work in multidisciplinary teams. Advanced English and native Spanish proficiency.

work.name: Hotelinking
work.summary: • Developed and maintained web and mobile applications, contributing to all phases of the software development lifecycle, from coding to deployment. • Resolved complex issues by managing tickets, debugging, and developing new features based on client requests. • Collaborated in Pull Request reviews, ensuring code quality and consistency through constructive feedback and adherence to best practices. • Implemented scalable, secure solutions on AWS Cloud, utilizing services such as Cognito, API Gateway, EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda. • Managed relational and non-relational databases, including MySQL, DynamoDB, and Redis for caching and performance optimization. • Employed Bitbucket for version control and JIRA for issue tracking, improving team collaboration and project management efficiency. • Contributed to project documentation using Confluence, ensuring clear communication of technical specifications and project status. • Led CI/CD practices, automating testing, deployment, and integration processes to streamline development workflows. • Conducted unit and integration testing using Vitest and Cypress, ensuring application stability and robustness in various environments. • Coordinated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration and consistent project delivery.

work.name: Scale AI, Inc
work.summary: • Trained and fine-tuned natural language AI models to autonomously analyze and resolve coding issues, improving the model’s problem-solving capabilities. • Developed and tested solutions for a variety of coding problems, ensuring high accuracy in issue diagnosis and resolution. • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to refine training datasets, contributing to the continuous improvement of AI models. • Utilized feedback from model outputs to enhance model performance and optimize the overall code analysis process. • Analyzed and documented model training results, providing insights for further optimization and development.

work.name: Viseven
work.summary: • Developed 100+ reusable Vue.js components for FDA/EMA-compliant pharmaceutical applications. • Engineered interactive medical content using GSAP animations with 95% cross-browser compatibility. • Integrated REST APIs with Google Analytics to track 120+ global CRM campaigns. • Optimized legacy browser performance (IE11+) through vanilla JS, reducing load time by 40%.

work.name: Argentine Federal Justice
work.summary: • Conducted complex judicial investigations in criminal matters, applying critical thinking and analyzing documentation and jurisprudence. • Coordinated tasks with multidisciplinary teams to ensure compliance with legal deadlines and objectives. • Provided legal representation and criminal legal advice to numerous clients.

skills.name: AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, Cognito, RDS, API Gateway)

projects.name: SportClub Frontend
projects.description: Frontend for SportClub benefits application, developed with Vite, React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
highlights: Benefits list with pagination and search

projects.name: SportClub Backend
projects.description: API developed in Node.js with TypeScript that provides access to SportClub benefits.
highlights: TypeScript for static typing and better maintainability
Axios for HTTP requests to external API
Jest for unit and integration testing
Custom middlewares for logging and error handling

projects.name: Gambet Frontend
projects.description: Prode-type application where users can predict sports results, compete in public or private tournaments and challenge their friends in a fun and simple way.

projects.name: Gambet Backend
projects.description: Prode-type application where users can predict sports results, compete in public or private tournaments and challenge their friends in a fun and simple way.

projects.name: Hotelinking Challenge
projects.description: Application where a user can view different products with promotional codes, get a code and redeem it in another view.
